appName.message: VertiTab - Amapaji ahagaze muri Side Panel

appDescription.message: Genzura amapaji ya browser muri side panel hamwe n'ibishobora guhindurwa, byiza kandi n'ibindi byinshi

disableSidebarAlert.message: Urashaka koko guhagarika sidebar ku mapaji yose? Kugira ngo wongere uyifungure, jya ku ipaji y'ibikoresho.
